parameter.name: RC_RL1_DSM_VCC
parameter.short_desc: Enable relay control of relay 1 mapped to the Spektrum receiver power supply

parameter.name: RC_DSM_BIND
parameter.long_desc: -1 = Idle, 0 = Start DSM2 bind, 1 = Start DSMX bind

parameter.name: RC_CHAN_CNT
parameter.long_desc: This parameter is used by Ground Station software to save the number of channels which were used during RC calibration. It is only meant for ground station use.

parameter.name: RC_TH_USER
parameter.short_desc: RC mode switch threshold automaic distribution
parameter.long_desc: This parameter is used by Ground Station software to specify whether the threshold values for flight mode switches were automatically calculated. 0 indicates that the threshold values were set by the user. Any other value indicates that the threshold value where automatically set by the ground station software. It is only meant for ground station use.

parameter.name: RC_MAP_ROLL
parameter.long_desc: The channel index (starting from 1 for channel 1) indicates which channel should be used for reading roll inputs from. A value of zero indicates the switch is not assigned.

parameter.name: RC_MAP_PITCH
parameter.long_desc: The channel index (starting from 1 for channel 1) indicates which channel should be used for reading pitch inputs from. A value of zero indicates the switch is not assigned.

parameter.name: RC_MAP_THROTTLE
parameter.long_desc: The channel index (starting from 1 for channel 1) indicates which channel should be used for reading throttle inputs from. A value of zero indicates the switch is not assigned.

parameter.name: RC_MAP_YAW
parameter.long_desc: The channel index (starting from 1 for channel 1) indicates which channel should be used for reading yaw inputs from. A value of zero indicates the switch is not assigned.

parameter.name: RC_MAP_AUX1
parameter.long_desc: Default function: Camera pitch

parameter.name: RC_MAP_AUX2
parameter.long_desc: Default function: Camera roll

parameter.name: RC_MAP_AUX3
parameter.long_desc: Default function: Camera azimuth / yaw

parameter.name: RC_MAP_PARAM1
parameter.long_desc: Can be used for parameter tuning with the RC. This one is further referenced as the 1st parameter channel. Set to 0 to deactivate *

parameter.name: RC_MAP_PARAM2
parameter.long_desc: Can be used for parameter tuning with the RC. This one is further referenced as the 2nd parameter channel. Set to 0 to deactivate *

parameter.name: RC_MAP_PARAM3
parameter.long_desc: Can be used for parameter tuning with the RC. This one is further referenced as the 3th parameter channel. Set to 0 to deactivate *

parameter.name: RC_FAILS_THR
parameter.long_desc: Set to a value slightly above the PWM value assumed by throttle in a failsafe event, but ensure it is below the PWM value assumed by throttle during normal operation.

parameter.name: RC_RSSI_PWM_CHAN
parameter.short_desc: PWM input channel that provides RSSI
parameter.long_desc: 0: do not read RSSI from input channel 1-18: read RSSI from specified input channel Specify the range for RSSI input with RC_RSSI_PWM_MIN and RC_RSSI_PWM_MAX parameters.

parameter.name: RC_RSSI_PWM_MAX
parameter.short_desc: Max input value for RSSI reading
parameter.long_desc: Only used if RC_RSSI_PWM_CHAN > 0

parameter.name: RC_RSSI_PWM_MIN
parameter.short_desc: Min input value for RSSI reading
parameter.long_desc: Only used if RC_RSSI_PWM_CHAN > 0

parameter.name: TRIM_ROLL
parameter.long_desc: The trim value is the actuator control value the system needs for straight and level flight. It can be calibrated by flying manually straight and level using the RC trims and copying them using the GCS.

parameter.name: TRIM_PITCH
parameter.long_desc: The trim value is the actuator control value the system needs for straight and level flight. It can be calibrated by flying manually straight and level using the RC trims and copying them using the GCS.

parameter.name: TRIM_YAW
parameter.long_desc: The trim value is the actuator control value the system needs for straight and level flight. It can be calibrated by flying manually straight and level using the RC trims and copying them using the GCS.

parameter.name: NAV_RCL_LT
parameter.long_desc: The amount of time in seconds the system should loiter at current position before termination Set to -1 to make the system skip loitering

parameter.name: RC_MAP_MODE_SW
parameter.long_desc: This is the main flight mode selector. The channel index (starting from 1 for channel 1) indicates which channel should be used for deciding about the main mode. A value of zero indicates the switch is not assigned.

parameter.name: RC_ASSIST_TH
parameter.long_desc: 0-1 indicate where in the full channel range the threshold sits 0 : min 1 : max sign indicates polarity of comparison positive : true when channel>th negative : true when channel<th

parameter.name: RC_AUTO_TH
parameter.long_desc: 0-1 indicate where in the full channel range the threshold sits 0 : min 1 : max sign indicates polarity of comparison positive : true when channel>th negative : true when channel<th

parameter.name: RC_RATT_TH
parameter.long_desc: 0-1 indicate where in the full channel range the threshold sits 0 : min 1 : max sign indicates polarity of comparison positive : true when channel>th negative : true when channel<th

parameter.name: RC_POSCTL_TH
parameter.long_desc: 0-1 indicate where in the full channel range the threshold sits 0 : min 1 : max sign indicates polarity of comparison positive : true when channel>th negative : true when channel<th

parameter.name: RC_RETURN_TH
parameter.short_desc: Threshold for selecting return to launch mode
parameter.long_desc: 0-1 indicate where in the full channel range the threshold sits 0 : min 1 : max sign indicates polarity of comparison positive : true when channel>th negative : true when channel<th

parameter.name: RC_LOITER_TH
parameter.long_desc: 0-1 indicate where in the full channel range the threshold sits 0 : min 1 : max sign indicates polarity of comparison positive : true when channel>th negative : true when channel<th

parameter.name: RC_ACRO_TH
parameter.long_desc: 0-1 indicate where in the full channel range the threshold sits 0 : min 1 : max sign indicates polarity of comparison positive : true when channel>th negative : true when channel<th

parameter.name: RC_OFFB_TH
parameter.long_desc: 0-1 indicate where in the full channel range the threshold sits 0 : min 1 : max sign indicates polarity of comparison positive : true when channel>th negative : true when channel<th

parameter.name: RTL_RETURN_ALT
parameter.long_desc: Altitude to fly back in RTL in meters

parameter.name: RTL_DESCEND_ALT
parameter.long_desc: Stay at this altitude above home position after RTL descending. Land (i.e. slowly descend) from this altitude if autolanding allowed.

parameter.name: RTL_LAND_DELAY
parameter.long_desc: Delay after descend before landing in RTL mode. If set to -1 the system will not land but loiter at NAV_LAND_ALT.

parameter.name: RWTO_TKOFF
parameter.short_desc: Enable or disable runway takeoff with landing gear
parameter.long_desc: 0: disabled, 1: enabled

parameter.name: RWTO_HDG
parameter.short_desc: Specifies which heading should be held during runnway takeoff
parameter.long_desc: 0: airframe heading, 1: heading towards takeoff waypoint

parameter.name: RWTO_NAV_ALT
parameter.short_desc: Altitude AGL at which we have enough ground clearance to allow some roll. Until RWTO_NAV_ALT is reached the plane is held level and only rudder is used to keep the heading (see RWTO_HDG). This should be below FW_CLMBOUT_DIFF if FW_CLMBOUT_DIFF > 0

parameter.name: RWTO_MAX_THR
parameter.short_desc: Max throttle during runway takeoff. (Can be used to test taxi on runway)

parameter.name: RWTO_PSP
parameter.short_desc: Pitch setpoint during taxi / before takeoff airspeed is reached. A taildragger with stearable wheel might need to pitch up a little to keep it's wheel on the ground before airspeed to takeoff is reached

parameter.name: RWTO_MAX_PITCH
parameter.short_desc: Max pitch during takeoff. Fixed-wing settings are used if set to 0. Note that there is also a minimum pitch of 10 degrees during takeoff, so this must be larger if set

parameter.name: RWTO_MAX_ROLL
parameter.short_desc: Max roll during climbout. Roll is limited during climbout to ensure enough lift and prevents aggressive navigation before we're on a safe height

parameter.name: RWTO_AIRSPD_SCL
parameter.short_desc: Min. airspeed scaling factor for takeoff. Pitch up will be commanded when the following airspeed is reached: FW_AIRSPD_MIN * RWTO_AIRSPD_SCL

parameter.name: SDLOG_RATE
parameter.long_desc: A value of -1 indicates the commandline argument should be obeyed. A value of 0 sets the minimum rate, any other value is interpreted as rate in Hertz. This parameter is only read out before logging starts (which commonly is before arming).

parameter.name: SDLOG_EXT
parameter.long_desc: A value of -1 indicates the commandline argument should be obeyed. A value of 0 disables extended logging mode, a value of 1 enables it. This parameter is only read out before logging starts (which commonly is before arming).

parameter.name: SDLOG_GPSTIME
parameter.short_desc: Use timestamps only if GPS 3D fix is available
parameter.long_desc: A value of 1 constrains the log folder creation to only use the time stamp if a 3D GPS lock is present.

parameter.name: CAL_BOARD_ID
parameter.short_desc: ID of the board this parameter set was calibrated on

parameter.name: CAL_GYRO0_ID
parameter.short_desc: ID of the Gyro that the calibration is for

parameter.name: CAL_MAG0_ID
parameter.short_desc: ID of Magnetometer the calibration is for

parameter.name: CAL_MAG0_ROT
parameter.short_desc: Rotation of magnetometer 0 relative to airframe
parameter.long_desc: An internal magnetometer will force a value of -1, so a GCS should only attempt to configure the rotation if the value is greater than or equal to zero.

parameter.name: CAL_ACC0_ID
parameter.short_desc: ID of the Accelerometer that the calibration is for

parameter.name: CAL_GYRO1_ID
parameter.short_desc: ID of the Gyro that the calibration is for

parameter.name: CAL_MAG1_ID
parameter.short_desc: ID of Magnetometer the calibration is for

parameter.name: CAL_MAG1_ROT
parameter.short_desc: Rotation of magnetometer 1 relative to airframe
parameter.long_desc: An internal magnetometer will force a value of -1, so a GCS should only attempt to configure the rotation if the value is greater than or equal to zero.

parameter.name: CAL_ACC1_ID
parameter.short_desc: ID of the Accelerometer that the calibration is for

parameter.name: CAL_GYRO2_ID
parameter.short_desc: ID of the Gyro that the calibration is for

parameter.name: CAL_MAG2_ID
parameter.short_desc: ID of Magnetometer the calibration is for

parameter.name: CAL_MAG2_ROT
parameter.short_desc: Rotation of magnetometer 2 relative to airframe
parameter.long_desc: An internal magnetometer will force a value of -1, so a GCS should only attempt to configure the rotation if the value is greater than or equal to zero.

parameter.name: CAL_ACC2_ID
parameter.short_desc: ID of the Accelerometer that the calibration is for

parameter.name: SENS_DPRES_OFF
parameter.long_desc: The offset (zero-reading) in Pascal

parameter.name: SENS_DPRES_ANSC
parameter.long_desc: Pick the appropriate scaling from the datasheet. this number defines the (linear) conversion from voltage to Pascal (pa). For the MPXV7002DP this is 1000. NOTE: If the sensor always registers zero, try switching the static and dynamic tubes.

parameter.name: SENS_BOARD_ROT
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines the rotation of the FMU board relative to the platform. Possible values are: 0 = No rotation 1 = Yaw 45° 2 = Yaw 90° 3 = Yaw 135° 4 = Yaw 180° 5 = Yaw 225° 6 = Yaw 270° 7 = Yaw 315° 8 = Roll 180° 9 = Roll 180°, Yaw 45° 10 = Roll 180°, Yaw 90° 11 = Roll 180°, Yaw 135° 12 = Pitch 180° 13 = Roll 180°, Yaw 225° 14 = Roll 180°, Yaw 270° 15 = Roll 180°, Yaw 315° 16 = Roll 90° 17 = Roll 90°, Yaw 45° 18 = Roll 90°, Yaw 90° 19 = Roll 90°, Yaw 135° 20 = Roll 270° 21 = Roll 270°, Yaw 45° 22 = Roll 270°, Yaw 90° 23 = Roll 270°, Yaw 135° 24 = Pitch 90° 25 = Pitch 270°

parameter.name: SENS_FLOW_ROT
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines the rotation of the PX4FLOW board relative to the platform. Zero rotation is defined as Y on flow board pointing towards front of vehicle Possible values are: 0 = No rotation 1 = Yaw 45° 2 = Yaw 90° 3 = Yaw 135° 4 = Yaw 180° 5 = Yaw 225° 6 = Yaw 270° 7 = Yaw 315°

parameter.name: SENS_BOARD_Y_OFF
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines a rotational offset in degrees around the Y (Pitch) axis. It allows the user to fine tune the board offset in the event of misalignment.

parameter.name: SENS_BOARD_X_OFF
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines a rotational offset in degrees around the X (Roll) axis It allows the user to fine tune the board offset in the event of misalignment.

parameter.name: SENS_BOARD_Z_OFF
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines a rotational offset in degrees around the Z (Yaw) axis. It allows the user to fine tune the board offset in the event of misalignment.

parameter.name: SENS_EXT_MAG_ROT
parameter.long_desc: This parameter defines the rotation of the external magnetometer relative to the platform (not relative to the FMU). See SENS_BOARD_ROT for possible values.

parameter.name: SENS_EXT_MAG
parameter.long_desc: * Set to 0 (default) to auto-detect (will try to get the external as primary) * Set to 1 to force the external magnetometer as primary * Set to 2 to force the internal magnetometer as primary

parameter.name: SUB_INTERV
parameter.short_desc: Interval of one subscriber in the example in ms

parameter.name: SUB_TESTF
parameter.short_desc: Float Demonstration Parameter in the Example

parameter.name: SYS_AUTOSTART
parameter.long_desc: CHANGING THIS VALUE REQUIRES A RESTART. Defines the auto-start script used to bootstrap the system.

parameter.name: SYS_AUTOCONFIG
parameter.long_desc: Set to 1 to reset parameters on next system startup (setting defaults). Platform-specific values are used if available. RC* parameters are preserved.

parameter.name: SYS_USE_IO
parameter.long_desc: Can be used to use a standard startup script but with a FMU only set-up. Set to 0 to force the FMU only set-up.

parameter.name: SYS_RESTART_TYPE
parameter.long_desc: Set by px4io to indicate type of restart

parameter.name: SYS_COMPANION
parameter.long_desc: CHANGING THIS VALUE REQUIRES A RESTART. Configures the baud rate of the companion computer interface. Set to zero to disable, set to these values to enable (NO OTHER VALUES SUPPORTED!) 921600: enables onboard mode at 921600 baud, 8N1. 57600: enables onboard mode at 57600 baud, 8N1. 157600: enables OSD mode at 57600 baud, 8N1.

parameter.name: SYS_PARAM_VER
parameter.long_desc: This monotonically increasing number encodes the parameter compatibility set. whenever it increases parameters might not be backwards compatible and ground control stations should suggest a fresh configuration.

parameter.name: UAVCAN_ENABLE
parameter.long_desc: Allowed values: 0 - UAVCAN disabled. 1 - Enabled support for UAVCAN actuators and sensors. 2 - Enabled support for dynamic node ID allocation and firmware update. 3 - Sets the motor control outputs to UAVCAN and enables support for dynamic node ID allocation and firmware update.

parameter.name: UAVCAN_NODE_ID
parameter.long_desc: Read the specs at http://uavcan.org to learn more about Node ID.

parameter.name: VT_TILT_MC
parameter.short_desc: Position of tilt servo in mc mode
parameter.long_desc: Position of tilt servo in mc mode

parameter.name: VT_TILT_TRANS
parameter.short_desc: Position of tilt servo in transition mode
parameter.long_desc: Position of tilt servo in transition mode

parameter.name: VT_TILT_FW
parameter.short_desc: Position of tilt servo in fw mode
parameter.long_desc: Position of tilt servo in fw mode

parameter.name: VT_TRANS_P2_DUR
parameter.long_desc: Time in seconds it should take for the rotors to rotate forward completely from the point when the plane has picked up enough airspeed and is ready to go into fixed wind mode.

parameter.name: VT_FW_MOT_OFF
parameter.short_desc: The channel number of motors that must be turned off in fixed wing mode

parameter.name: VT_TRANS_THR
parameter.short_desc: Target throttle value for pusher/puller motor during the transition to fw mode

parameter.name: VT_IDLE_PWM_MC
parameter.short_desc: Idle speed of VTOL when in multicopter mode

parameter.name: VT_MC_ARSPD_MIN
parameter.long_desc: This is the minimum speed of the air flowing over the control surfaces.

parameter.name: VT_MC_ARSPD_MAX
parameter.long_desc: This is the maximum speed of the air flowing over the control surfaces.

parameter.name: VT_MC_ARSPD_TRIM
parameter.short_desc: Trim airspeed when in multicopter mode
parameter.long_desc: This is the airflow over the control surfaces for which no airspeed scaling is applied in multicopter mode.

parameter.name: VT_FW_PERM_STAB
parameter.long_desc: If set to one this parameter will cause permanent attitude stabilization in fw mode. This parameter has been introduced for pure convenience sake.

parameter.name: VT_FW_PITCH_TRIM
parameter.long_desc: This parameter allows to adjust the neutral elevon position in fixed wing mode.

parameter.name: VT_POWER_MAX
parameter.long_desc: Indicates the maximum power the motor is able to produce. Used to calculate propeller efficiency map.

parameter.name: VT_PROP_EFF
parameter.long_desc: Influences propeller efficiency at different power settings. Should be tuned beforehand.

parameter.name: VT_ARSP_LP_GAIN
parameter.short_desc: Total airspeed estimate low-pass filter gain
parameter.long_desc: Gain for tuning the low-pass filter for the total airspeed estimate

parameter.name: VT_ELEV_MC_LOCK
parameter.long_desc: If set to 1 the elevons are locked in multicopter mode

parameter.name: VT_F_TRANS_DUR
parameter.long_desc: Time in seconds used for a transition

parameter.name: VT_B_TRANS_DUR
parameter.long_desc: Time in seconds used for a back transition

parameter.name: VT_ARSP_BLEND
parameter.long_desc: Airspeed at which we can start blending both fw and mc controls. Set to 0 to disable.

parameter.name: VT_ARSP_TRANS
parameter.long_desc: Airspeed at which we can switch to fw mode

parameter.name: MT_ENABLED
parameter.long_desc: Set to 1 to enable mTECS

parameter.name: MT_THR_FF
parameter.short_desc: Total Energy Rate Control Feedforward Maps the total energy rate setpoint to the throttle setpoint

parameter.name: MT_THR_P
parameter.short_desc: Total Energy Rate Control P Maps the total energy rate error to the throttle setpoint

parameter.name: MT_THR_I
parameter.short_desc: Total Energy Rate Control I Maps the integrated total energy rate to the throttle setpoint

parameter.name: MT_THR_OFF
parameter.short_desc: Total Energy Rate Control Offset (Cruise throttle sp)

parameter.name: MT_PIT_FF
parameter.short_desc: Energy Distribution Rate Control Feedforward Maps the energy distribution rate setpoint to the pitch setpoint

parameter.name: MT_PIT_P
parameter.short_desc: Energy Distribution Rate Control P Maps the energy distribution rate error to the pitch setpoint

parameter.name: MT_PIT_I
parameter.short_desc: Energy Distribution Rate Control I Maps the integrated energy distribution rate error to the pitch setpoint

parameter.name: MT_PIT_OFF
parameter.short_desc: Total Energy Distribution Offset (Cruise pitch sp)

parameter.name: MT_FPA_LP
parameter.short_desc: Lowpass (cutoff freq.) for the flight path angle

parameter.name: MT_FPA_P
parameter.short_desc: P gain for the altitude control Maps the altitude error to the flight path angle setpoint

parameter.name: MT_FPA_D
parameter.short_desc: D gain for the altitude control Maps the change of altitude error to the flight path angle setpoint

parameter.name: MT_FPA_D_LP
parameter.short_desc: Lowpass for FPA error derivative calculation (see MT_FPA_D)

parameter.name: MT_ACC_P
parameter.short_desc: P gain for the airspeed control Maps the airspeed error to the acceleration setpoint

parameter.name: MT_ACC_D
parameter.short_desc: D gain for the airspeed control Maps the change of airspeed error to the acceleration setpoint

parameter.name: MT_ACC_D_LP
parameter.short_desc: Lowpass for ACC error derivative calculation (see MT_ACC_D)

parameter.name: MT_LND_THR_MIN
parameter.short_desc: Minimal throttle in landing mode (only last phase of landing)

parameter.name: MT_LND_THR_MAX
parameter.short_desc: Maximal throttle in landing mode (only last phase of landing)

parameter.name: MT_THR_I_MAX
parameter.short_desc: Integrator Limit for Total Energy Rate Control

parameter.name: MT_PIT_I_MAX
parameter.short_desc: Integrator Limit for Energy Distribution Rate Control

parameter.name: RC_MAP_FAILSAFE
parameter.long_desc: The RC mapping index indicates which channel is used for failsafe If 0, whichever channel is mapped to throttle is used otherwise the value indicates the specific rc channel to use

parameter.name: FW_FLARE_PMIN
parameter.long_desc: Minimum pitch during flare, a positive sign means nose up Applied once FW_LND_TLALT is reached

parameter.name: FW_FLARE_PMAX
parameter.long_desc: Maximum pitch during flare, a positive sign means nose up Applied once FW_LND_TLALT is reached

parameter.name: LED_RGB_MAXBRT
parameter.long_desc: Set to 0 to disable, 1 for minimum brightness up to 15 (max)
